text: Fhe Bakɨme zumgum hɨrga bigi bun nzuaim, nta kha gavar kim, nde nta mbararagi gumgi gu mbigi, gu kama havharar nde nzuai. Maaŋ muuŋgip, guma the harigi kama thuen Fhe Bakɨme kamthooŋ guma kha gavar suaŋgi buneŋ ga phevarga, Fhe Bakɨme kha gavar mba hɨr za suaŋgi bigi mbatɨgi, Fhe Bakɨme mba bigi mbatɨgir mba guman hɨrga bigir mbatɨgi ga phevarga.
